programme.desc: One morning in June 2020, graffiti reading RIP SENI appeared emblazoned across a public artwork outside the Bethlem royal hospital, a psychiatric hospital in south London.

programme.title: Dallas Detective agency | Why journalists carry guns in the Philippines
programme.desc: Dallas Detective agency | Why journalists carry guns in the Philippines

programme.title: The Circle: masculinity, racism and brotherhood on a Hackney estate
programme.desc: Two brothers living on a council estate in Hackney, east London, express their experiences of masculinity, racism and brotherhood through dance and direct testimony

programme.title: Someone Else's War
programme.desc: To date at least 20 British nationals, some with no previous experience of combat, have travelled to Syria to fight Isis on the frontline.

programme.title: The only way out is through Jesus: The El Salvador pastors saving MS-13 gang members
programme.desc: In El Salvador, where brutal gangs like MS-13 and 18th Street have given the country the world’s highest murder rate, the only way out for members is to become born-again Christians.

programme.title: The Fight
programme.desc: People with disabilities are among the most discriminated against in Bolivia. Fed up with being ignored, a group of them march across the Andes to the seat of the government in La Paz, asking to speak to President Evo Morales. They are met with riot police, barricades, teargas and water cannon.

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: A glimpse into the lives of three Greenlanders: a hunter, a ship’s captain and a fisherman, individuals whose very existence and heritage is intertwined with the Arctic Ocean.

programme.title: My journey back to Dominica after the hurricane
programme.desc: This year the Caribbean experienced its most destructive hurricane season in decades. While large countries dominated the headlines, the small island nation of Dominica suffered the worst devastation it has ever seen.

programme.title: The Wolf Dividing Norway
programme.desc: With unique access to remote communities in the snow-capped landscape of Norway, this film follows characters on either side of a fierce debate on whether to cull the wolf population.

programme.title: Sport 2.0
programme.desc: How golf and athletics are evolving for a new generation of fans | How football is adapting to the demands of the digital world

programme.title: Weight of the World
programme.desc: Decades ago, three pioneering Australian scientists were some of the first to warn the world about a looming climate crisis. They were branded alarmists and faced political pressure.

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: ‘It's a community coming together’: an army of volunteers fight to save their river | 'It's something I have to do': pilots who fly abortion patients across state lines

programme.title: America's Dirty Divide
programme.desc: The US town swallowed by Big Oil's 'chemical soup' | Why is this majority Black city grappling with 100-year-old sewers?

programme.title: Seascape: the state of our oceans
programme.desc: Plastic in paradise: the battle for the Galápagos Islands' future | Plastic pollution: ‘I’m giving up. You probably should too’

programme.title: America's Dirty Divide
programme.desc: How heat is radically altering Americans' lives before they're even born | Baltimore is burning trash, so we're starving the fire

programme.title: What's it like to spar with Carl Froch? | It's my body of armour
programme.desc: What's it like to spar with Carl Froch? | It's my body of armour: my life as a female bodybuilder

programme.title: Sprinter Factory
programme.desc: These are the girls running as fast as they can to be Jamaica’s new sprint champions in a country obsessed with its athletes. This is the story of the Champs national youth athletics competition that could change their lives.

programme.title: Blood, sweat and fears: special report on abuse towards grassroots football referees
programme.desc: The FA has rebooted its Respect Campaign this season to protect grassroots referees in England but many continue to suffer both mental and physical abuse.

programme.title: The pig superbug and the baby
programme.desc: How did the antibiotic resistant pig superbug LA-MRSA find its way onto the umbilical cords of new born babies in Glasgow - and onto the shelves of our biggest supermarkets.

programme.title: The women on a 'war footing' as the cost of living crisis deepens
programme.desc: The Guardian's Maeve Shearlaw and Christopher Cherry went to meet the women who have begun work on transforming a crumbling building into a women-focused support centre in the area that has the highest rate of child poverty in the UK.

programme.title: Forcing cyclists to wear helmets | Do cyclists think they're above the law
programme.desc: Why forcing cyclists to wear helmets will not save their lives | Do cyclists think they're above the law, and does it even matter

programme.title: The 'Lost Rambos' of Papua New Guinea: how weapons and Hollywood changed tribal disputes
programme.desc: Tribal fighting has long been present in the Papua New Guinea highlands but the influx of modern automatic weaponry in the 1990s turned local disputes into lethal exchanges that threatened to permanently reshape highlands culture.

programme.title: 2020: A Covid Space Odyssey
programme.desc: A short diary of astronaut Jessica Meir during her seven-month mission on the International Space Station (September 2019 - April 2020).

programme.title: How a conference call sparked America's abortion obsession | The Daphne Project
programme.desc: How a conference call sparked America's abortion obsession | The Daphne Project: 'Journalism was her life': Daphne Caruana Galizia's family speak out

programme.title: From the Bronx to Yale: the power of high school 'speech'
programme.desc: High school students from Democracy Prep school in the South Bronx, New York, compete against young people across the US at a ‘speech’ competition at Yale University, a form of competitive acting.

programme.title: Inside Out: Indigenous imprisonment in Australia
programme.desc: Filmed on the plains of north-western New South Wales, this documentary looks at one man's fight against the scourge of Indigenous imprisonment in his community.

programme.title: Strokestra: The power of music | Dementia Diaries
programme.desc: Hitting the right note: the orchestra helping stroke survivors recover | Dementia Diaries: 'It's like trying to go through a brick wall'

programme.title: Should robots have faces? | Are computers killing the mystery of chess?
programme.desc: Should robots have faces? | Are computers killing the mystery of chess?

programme.title: Paris: where street basketball meets hip-hop | Mark Rothko murals at Tate Modern
programme.desc: Paris: where street basketball meets hip-hop | Waves of mysterious meaning: Mark Rothko murals at Tate Modern

programme.title: Inside a long Covid clinic | My year of long Covid
programme.desc: Inside a long Covid clinic: ’I look normal, but my body is breaking down’ | ‘The pandemic isn’t over’: my year of long Covid

programme.title: Inside the youth anti-abortion movement in the US | Abortion stories
programme.desc: Inside the youth anti-abortion movement in the US: 'Victory is on its way' | Abortion stories: from backstreet to legalisation

programme.title: Qandeel
programme.desc: The life, death and impact of Pakistan’s working-class icon Qandeel Baloch, killed in 2016 after becoming a social media celebrity.

programme.title: Dear Mamma: a transgender man, his mother and their journey in letters
programme.desc: When Naissa tells his mother Daniela that he identifies as a trans man she struggles to understand.

programme.title: The homeless Popeyes worker fighting for fair wages | The homeless residents of a Tudor hotel
programme.desc: The homeless Popeyes worker fighting for fair wages in Missouri | 'I feel like I've got my life back': the homeless residents of a Tudor hotel

programme.title: Right to fight: Martial arts fighter with Down's syndrome
programme.desc: Garrett Holeve (aka G Money) has always dreamt of being a Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) fighter, and with the full support of his parents, prepares to fight another disabled opponent. But Florida authorities deemed the contest a health risk.

programme.title: Muxes
programme.desc: In Juchitán, Mexico, muxes – children identified as male at birth, but who choose at a young age to be raised as female – are embraced as part of the community.

programme.title: The Hour of Lynching - vigilante violence in India
programme.desc: Rakbar, a Muslim dairy farmer, was murdered by a Hindu mob who thought he was taking a cow to be slaughtered for meat.

programme.title: Black Pete | Comedy theatre about life in the Calais refugee camp
programme.desc: Black Pete: Why is the Dutch blackface tradition still going strong? | I don't want any more sadness in my life - comedy theatre about life in the Calais refugee camp

programme.title: Flat Earth: meet the people casting aside 2,500 years of science
programme.desc: Though not a new phenomenon, flat Earth theory has enjoyed a huge resurgence recently.

programme.title: Is algorave the future of dance music? | Wet plate collodion photography
programme.desc: Run the code: is algorave the future of dance music? | The black art: wet plate collodion photography

programme.title: Pitching up
programme.desc: How Ireland’s ancient sports are helping to integrate children in the country's most ethnically diverse town.

programme.title: The UK's first professional trans choir: 'It's a joyful act of resistance'
programme.desc: Anil Sebastian and Coda Galabov are the creators of a new choir called Trans Voices, which offers a space for trans and non-binary people who have felt unable to sing with their true voices in traditional choirs.

programme.title: Justice for Adama: the family protesting against police brutality in France
programme.desc: Adama Traoré died in police custody last year. His family’s struggle for justice has put police brutality back under the spotlight in France, and his older sister Assa is leading the battle to find out the truth about his death.

programme.title: Racing to keep our language alive: H̓ágṃ́ṇtxv Qṇtxv Tx̌ (We’re all we got)
programme.desc: There are only seven people left in the world who can fluently speak Marvin's mother tongue, Haíɫzaqvḷa. Out of 6,700 languages spoken worldwide, 40% are in danger of extinction.

programme.title: Meet the brewers of the craft beer revolution | Neuro-cuisine: exploring the science of flavour
programme.desc: Meet the brewers of the craft beer revolution | Neuro-cuisine: exploring the science of flavour

programme.title: Canada's Music Cities
programme.desc: Canada's Music Cities

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: City champions: 'Make them look twice and think twice' | How we've told the great story of urbanisation

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - The artist and their city
programme.desc: The artist and their city: Ai Weiwei on Beijing: 'It's a prison for freedom of speech' | Antony Gormley: 'London is bought, developed and abandoned'

programme.title: Off The Page
programme.desc: Britain Isn't Eating | Groove is in the Heart | Death of England

programme.title: Guardian Australia: My People
programme.desc: In the video series ‘My People’, Guardian Australia explores the peculiar subcultures and niche communities bringing people together across the country. With the breakdown of more traditional communities, these new groups of shared common interests are more important than ever.

programme.title: This is the NHS
programme.desc: The great British booze problem for the NHS | Knocked down, spat at and trampled on: another day in A&E

programme.title: Seascape: the state of our oceans
programme.desc: Plastic in paradise: the battle for the Galápagos Islands' future | Plastic pollution: ‘I’m giving up. You probably should too’

programme.title: Funeral poverty: one woman's battle to pay for her son's burial
programme.desc: One suddenly bereaved mother, already in debt, has to find thousands of pounds to pay for her son's funeral.

programme.title: My life in a hotel room: Ireland’s hidden homeless crisis
programme.desc: Nuala and her teenage daughter, Laura, were suddenly evicted from their Dublin home when their landlord of 10 years was forced to sell by his creditors.

programme.title: Meet the people fighting to keep Ireland's abortion ban | Peterloo: A massacre that changed Britain
programme.desc: Meet the people fighting to keep Ireland's abortion ban | A massacre that changed Britain: does Peterloo still resonate today?

programme.title: Fighting Shame
programme.desc: A group of women use everyday items to tell of the sacrifices and difficult choices they face, and the community initiatives they have launched in an attempt to tackle the shame surrounding poverty and make policymakers listen.

programme.title: The Tower next door
programme.desc: In June 2017 residents of the Silchester estate woke to discover Grenfell Tower engulfed in flames, witnessing a terrifying national tragedy unfolding on their doorstep. The tower bore a striking resemblance to their own.

programme.title: The year that never ended: how a Ukrainian comedian rebuilt a stranger's house
programme.desc: The Ukrainian comedian Vasyl Baidak sparks an unlikely and enduring friendship with retiree Iryna Terekhova when he joins a group of young people from Kyiv to rebuild her home.

programme.title: The County - what happens after police kill someone you love?
programme.desc: When someone dies after an encounter with law enforcement, he leaves behind parents and children, loss and confusion. What’s to be done when those people sworn to protect you are the same people who pull the trigger?

programme.title: Dallas Detective agency | Why journalists carry guns in the Philippines
programme.desc: Dallas Detective agency | Why journalists carry guns in the Philippines

programme.title: World Cup Slaves
programme.desc: Nepalese men employed in Qatar's construction industry tell Robert Booth how they work for little or no pay as they build the infrastructure ahead of the 2022 football World Cup.

programme.title: Guantánamo Diary | The quest for the perfect male six-packs
programme.desc: Guantánamo Diary: rendition, torture and detention without charge | Steroids, syringes and stigma: the quest for the perfect male six-packs

programme.title: Lives Instead of Knives: one woman's struggle to end knife crime
programme.desc: Smith's Farm Estate in Northolt, north-west London, has been the scene of multiple stabbings. After one murder came particularly close to home, community volunteer Jen Lock began a one-woman mission to end knife crime in the area. But, as she finds out, things don’t always go smoothly.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already "living in the future"!

It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Dave rusza do West Yorkshire, aby odebrać rzadki autobus marki Dodge z 1926 r., pojawia się niezwykły francuski samochód sportowy, a w ręce Dereka wpada samochód policyjny vauxhall victor VX90.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Dave jedzie do Bolton po klasyczny włoski samochód sportowy; w Sunderland Paul zostawia auto union 1000 z 1960 r. i odbiera popularnego sunbeama talbota 90 z 1951 r.

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Grenlandzka zima zagraża wysiłkom całego zespołu. Poszukiwacze walczą z potężną, arktyczną burzą. Elley powraca; zespół wita ją bardzo chłodno, ale ona wie, jak może ich do siebie przekonać...

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ekipa Clayton's Towing próbuje poradzić sobie z jachtem wyrzuconym na ląd; GRS Towing wyrusza w ośnieżone góry na 48-godzinną misję, a Wagga Truck Towing ma przed sobą bardzo trudne zadanie.

programme.title: Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Nowy zespół obserwacyjny RAF o kryptonimie Poseidon rusza do akcji, gdy w pobliżu ważnego brytyjskiego rurociągu zostaje zauważony rosyjski okręt wojenny.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Zimowy sezon połowu homarów kończy się za dwa dni. Na morzu pozostały już tylko trzy z sześciu kutrów: Triton, Bold Contender i Anson Bay.

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: Dean Macey i Adam Rooney są w Hiszpanii nad rzeką Ebro. Celem tej wyprawy jest złowienie ogromnego suma pospolitego o wadze ponad 45 kilogramów oraz dorodnych okazów płoci i karpia.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep5
programme.desc: W garażu na przedmieściach w hrabstwie Yorkshire stoi bardzo poszukiwane audi quattro. Z Irlandii Północnej przyjeżdża sunbeam, a Derek zakochuje się w rzadkim motocyklu z Francji.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: W czasie bitwy morskiej wojskowy operator radaru błędnie zidentyfikował zbliżający się cywilny samolot jako wrogi myśliwiec. Maszyna została zestrzelona, a wszystkie 290 osób na pokładzie zginęło.

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Grenlandzka zima zagraża wysiłkom całego zespołu. Poszukiwacze walczą z potężną, arktyczną burzą. Elley powraca; zespół wita ją bardzo chłodno, ale ona wie, jak może ich do siebie przekonać...

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ekipa Clayton's Towing próbuje poradzić sobie z jachtem wyrzuconym na ląd; GRS Towing wyrusza w ośnieżone góry na 48-godzinną misję, a Wagga Truck Towing ma przed sobą bardzo trudne zadanie.

programme.title: Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Nowy zespół obserwacyjny RAF o kryptonimie Poseidon rusza do akcji, gdy w pobliżu ważnego brytyjskiego rurociągu zostaje zauważony rosyjski okręt wojenny.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Zimowy sezon połowu homarów kończy się za dwa dni. Na morzu pozostały już tylko trzy z sześciu kutrów: Triton, Bold Contender i Anson Bay.

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: We Włoszech Dean i Macey próbują złapać ogromnego suma pospolitego. W Padzie ryby te osiągają rekordowe rozmiary - niektóre ważą nawet prawie 140 kg! Dla wędkarzy to okazja złowienia ryby życia.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Derek odbiera sportowy samochód marki Morgan i spotyka gwiazdę muzyki pop. Do Thornton-le-Dale trafia ambulans z czasów II wojny światowej. Ford model T potrzebuje nowego domu.

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Konstrukcja śluzy jest gotowa, ale jej transport na miejsce to ogromne wyzwanie: teren jest wyjątkowo trudny. Ciężka praca zostaje nagrodzona: Grenlandia w końcu dzieli się swoim złotem!

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Firma Parks Towing usuwa ciężarówkę, która rozbiła się na nasypie, North Coast Towing usuwa spaloną naczepę, a Clayton's Towing wraz z inną firmą holuje 40-tonową przyczepę kempingową.

programme.title: Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mody pilot Buzz spotyka nad Syri rosyjski samolot, kiedy jego skrzydowy ma awari kokpitu. Awaria myliwca w Estonii oznacza, e granice NATO nie s dobrze chronione przed Rosjanami.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.desc: Zimowy sezon połowów na jeziorze Winnipeg zaczyna się w tym roku dosyć wcześnie. Załogi lodowych wikingów starają się jak najszybciej dostać na lód, aby zarzucić sieci.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: W czasie lotu PA 434 samolotem wstrząsa eksplozja. Maszyna zostaje poważnie uszkodzona, załoga zmuszona jest do awaryjnego lądowania.

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Konstrukcja śluzy jest gotowa, ale jej transport na miejsce to ogromne wyzwanie: teren jest wyjątkowo trudny. Ciężka praca zostaje nagrodzona: Grenlandia w końcu dzieli się swoim złotem!

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: W angielskim Costwolds do Deana i Adama dołącza wędkarz Matt Godfrey. Celem tej wyprawy jest lin, który musi ważyć ponad 2 kg. Chcą też złowić sandacza o wadze ponad 4,5 kg, zwanego rybą-wampirem.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep7
programme.desc: W Hull na Mathewsonów czeka wrak klasycznego brytyjskiego samochodu sportowego, w którym rośnie drzewo! W północnej Walii Mathewsonowie znajdują hot hatcha, nietkniętego od niemal 20 lat.

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Choć zespół zaczynał od zera, udało się rozpocząć wydobycie i znaleźć złoto. Niestety, grenlandzka pogoda wkrótce uniemożliwi wszelkie działania...

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ekipa Wagga Truck Towing holuje 22-tonową ciężarówkę do przewozu bydła, Clayton's Towing ratuje klasyczne samochody warte pół miliona dolarów, a Parks Towing interweniuje w sytuacjach kryzysowych.

programme.title: Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Chory Dave Barr przygotowuje si do przejcia na emerytur po 33 latach suby, ale wszystkie plany zostaj wstrzymane, kiedy okazuje si, e zmara krlowa Elbieta II.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.desc: Temperatura spada, a rybacy starają się łowić najcenniejsze gatunki ryb. Całe jezioro jest już pokryte lodem, co stwarza wiele dodatkowych wyzwań i problemów.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: To miał być rutynowy lot na platformę wiertniczą, ale ekstremalne warunki pogodowe sprawiły, że śmigłowiec super puma zniknął z radarów...

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Choć zespół zaczynał od zera, udało się rozpocząć wydobycie i znaleźć złoto. Niestety, grenlandzka pogoda wkrótce uniemożliwi wszelkie działania...

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: W Chorwacji Dean i Adam są z wędkarzem Garym Newmanem. Tym razem celem wyprawy jest karp. Swoją krucjatę zaczynają nad pełnym ryb jeziorem i chcą złowić rzadkiego amura białego o wadze ponad 13 kg.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Derek znajduje rzadkiego forda zodiaka farnham estate. Dave jedzie do Midlands, aby odebrać triumpha Toledo. Czy ktoś będzie miał odwagę kupić elektryczny pojazd do rozwożenia mleka?

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Zespół walczy z końcówką huraganu Larry. Wszyscy są zdeterminowani i chcą postawić wszystko na jedną kartę w ostatnim tygodniu sezonu. Ray wyrusza na ostatnią wyprawę, która może spełnić ich marzenia.

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bryce, praktykant z firmy Truckworks, ma pomóc Lyle'owi w holowaniu naczepy, która blokuje trasę dla ciężarówek. Firma Clayton's Towing pomaga farmerowi z ciągnikiem, który zsunął się z mostu.

programme.title: Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Najlepsi z najlepszych: Royal Air Force S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mody pilot Moz musi zachowa spokj, aby stawi czoo rosyjskiemu zagroeniu na froncie NATO. Staysta Ross Macleod staje przed najwikszym wyzwaniem w caej swojej karierze w RAF.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.desc: Chris Kristjanson dostaje wagon mieszkalny, który należał niegdyś do jego ojca — ale nie ma ochoty go używać. Ekipa Husavik ma problemy ze złowieniem zaplanowanej zdobyczy.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: Kiedy Boeing 767 rozbił się w Atlantyku u wybrzeży wyspy Nantucket, a wszyscy na pokładzie ponieśli śmierć, pojawiły się pytania o usterki techniczne, problemy z hydrauliką i zmęczenie pilotów.

programme.title: Złoto z mroźnej krainy
programme.desc: Zespół walczy z końcówką huraganu Larry. Wszyscy są zdeterminowani i chcą postawić wszystko na jedną kartę w ostatnim tygodniu sezonu. Ray wyrusza na ostatnią wyprawę, która może spełnić ich marzenia.

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bryce, praktykant z firmy Truckworks, ma pomóc Lyle'owi w holowaniu naczepy, która blokuje trasę dla ciężarówek. Firma Clayton's Towing pomaga farmerowi z ciągnikiem, który zsunął się z mostu.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Storm Hunters | Heartache & Hope
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary town with a history of heartache. No one knows why Moore, Oklahoma has been the target of 3 mega-tornadoes in just 16 years. On the heels of the May 20, 2013 EF5 tornado, Mark & Jaclyn uncover stories behind the disaster, the recovery and the tenacious spirit of the people of the US Midwest.
