programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #01: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports 2025 and to the thrilling finale of the BrinxWorld Downhill Skateboarding Championship2024 from the breathtaking slopes of Roan Mountain, USA, where speed meets skill and gravity takes no prisoners.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #02: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: Today we look back at the 2024 Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup – a season of breathtaking tricks, fierce competition, and unforgettable moments. Join us as we relive the highlights, celebrate the champions, and wrap up an incredible year on the water!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #03: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow
programme.desc: World Rookie Tour Skate & Snow / Europe: A look back at the skate highlights of the 2023 World Rookie Tour. Then we show the best of the 2024 ski and snowboard action. And finally, we let it rip once again - with the 2024 Skate Finals!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís Pro (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its second stop in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - as always with the best freeriders from around the world! Thus, the FWT returns to the freeride Mecca of the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - 25 Years Xtreme Verbier - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier Xtreme gave birth to the Freeride World Tour, the Freeride World Qualifiers and the Freeride Junior Tour and sparked an international wave of competitive freeriding.

programme.title: The legend of Muksu river - Tajikistan
programme.desc: This is a journey to the Silk Road in Central Asia into the adventurous world of canoeing. The Muksu in Tajikistan is one of the three most difficult rapids here. Once immersed in the river, there is no turning back.

programme.title: Trans Hong Kong - A Urban MTB Adventure (HKG)
programme.desc: The urban mountain bike adventure series combines rides in some of the world's largest cities. In this episode we cycle through the Hong Kong region with none other than Hans “no way” Rey, the grandfather of mountain bike freeriding.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam Paragliding - The Dream of Flight
programme.desc: We take you into the sky and accompany a paragliding virtuoso to the Mont Blanc massif, the Atacama Desert in Chile and the Greek island of Santorini. Follow French paraglider pilot Jean-Baptiste Chandelier.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals - Freestyle Ski and Snowboard
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode gibt es die volle Dosis Freestyle Snowboarding und Skiing. Junge talentierte Athleten aus der ganzen Welt können bei den World Rookie Finals 2023 ihr Können unter Beweis stellen. Schauen wir uns das mal an!

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #21: IWSA World Cup & My own way - Lindsey Hamm
programme.desc: In the first part, we follow the exciting action of the IWSA Wingfoil World Cup in Morocco. In the second part, the focus is on the American climber Lindsey Hamm, who presents an intimate portrait of her life.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 GLORY 10 Los Angeles SFS
programme.desc: GLORY 10: Los Angeles on September 28, 2013 at the Citizens Business Bank Arena in Ontario, California. The highlight of the event featured a Glory Middleweight World Championship Tournament.[15] Two tournament matches were held, with a third match as reserve. The winners of the two semi-final bouts, proceeded to the finals for the championship main-event. The event also featured eight other non-tournament bouts.

programme.title: GLORY 100 Preview Show
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 K1 World Grand Prix: Finals, Tokyo, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Tokyo Dome in Tokyo, Japan on Saturday, December 6, 2003 in front of 67,320 spectators. It was the eleventh K-1 World Grand Prix final involving ten of the world's best fighters (two being reservists). The eight finalists had almost all qualified via preliminary events, while two additional fighters were invited as reserve fighters (for more detail on this see bulleted list below), with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs).

programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 K1 World Grand Prix: Finals, Tokyo, 2003

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY 100 Preview Show
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: An athlete is only as good as their coaches can make them. Hard Knocks star Jesse Arnett believes that Anderson Gonclaves is the reason he developped into a top contender for the UFC. This episode explores what makes Goncalves such an inspiration to his fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E196 Undercover Love S1 E196
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E196 Dholi Beats S1 E196
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E196 King of Hearts S1 E196
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E196 Second Chances S1 E196
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E50 Jodha Akbar S2 E50
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E196 This is Fate S1 E196
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E51 Jodha Akbar S2 E51
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E197 This is Fate S1 E197
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.desc: Urzędnik bankowy i jego kuzyn, "generał", łączą siły, by wytropić meksykańskiego banitę.

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 22, 23, 24
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Generał
programme.desc: Kolorowa wersja filmu. Kiedy szpiedzy Unii kradną ukochaną lokomotywę inżyniera, ten samotnie ściga ją prosto przez linie wroga.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Rzeź za Dziesięć Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Django zostaje poproszony o schwytanie złoczyńcy, który porwał pewną młodą dziewczynę.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Martwi ludzie
programme.desc: Na bezprawnym Starym Zachodzie, dwóch braci wyrusza w pełną niebezpieczeństw podróż. Ich celem jest pomszczenie śmierci ojca, ochrona plemienia Apaczów, które kochają, i odzyskanie należnych im ziem oraz złota. W trakcie wyprawy będą musieli zmierzyć się z licznymi zagrożeniami i trudnymi decyzjami, a ich więź braterska zostanie wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Dwa Rewolwery i Tchórz
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen, młody rewolwerowiec, który pracuje jako cyrkowiec, jest świadkiem zabójstwa kilku banitów dokonanego przez ich przywódcę. Sam zostaje uznany za winnego tego czynu. Steffen cierpi na kompleks, który blokuje go przed jakąkolwiek przemocą i sprawia, że wydaje się tchórzliwy. Kiedy młody chłopiec zostaje porwany, musi znaleźć sposób, aby odzyskać spokój.

programme.title: Miasteczko Abilene
programme.desc: Pierwszy raz w kolorze! Klasyczny amerykański western z 1946 roku z Randolphem Scottem w roli głównej: Miasteczko Abilene. Szeryf stara się zapobiec sporom między osadnikami na Dzikim Zachodzie po wojnie secesyjnej.

programme.title: Piętnaście Stryczków Dla Mordercy
programme.desc: Oskarżeni o ohydną zbrodnię, której nie popełnili, członkowie dwóch rywalizujących ze sobą gangów uciekają przez rozwścieczonym tłumem. Chronią się w opuszczonym forcie, biorąc wcześniej dwóch zakładników.

programme.title: Ostatni Zabójca
programme.desc: Rodzice Ramona zostają zabici przez ludzi właściciela ziemskiego Johna Barretta. Próbując się zemścić, Ramon zostaje ranny, ale udaje mu się uratować życie Rezzy, staremu, zdesperowanemu rewolwerowcowi.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 25,26,27
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Sabata
programme.desc: Sabata i Mangosta to rabusie. Po napadzie na bank i w wyniku serii niefortunnych wydarzeń, nawiązują współpracę z pracownikiem tegoż banku, Peterem. Rabusie uciekają, ale na ich drodze staje szef Petera i wynajęci przez niego rewolwerowcy.

programme.title: Łowca Głów w Trinity
programme.desc: Mieszkańcy miasteczka Trinity postanawiają wynająć osławionego łowcę nagród, aby chronił ich przed groźnym gangiem meksykańskich bandytów terroryzujących okolicę.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Szalony Pies Morgan
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia irlandzkiego banity Daniela Morgana, który jest poszukiwany, żywy lub martwy, w Australii w latach 50-tych XIX wieku.

programme.title: Piąte - Nie Zabijaj
programme.desc: Po napadzie na bank grupa banitów zbiera się w opuszczonym saloonie. Okazuje się, że brakuje łupu, a bandyci zaczynają się wzajemnie obrażać.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado to uzbrojony, zawodowy hazardzista. Przyjeżdża on do małego miasteczka Silver Mine, gdzie wda się w walkę z niejakim Tucanem. Djurado zdobędzie połowę miejscowego saloonu, którego druga część należy do Barbary.

programme.title: Generał Custer
programme.desc: Generał Custer - Miłość George'a Armstronga Custera do bohaterskich tradycji Kalwarii i niechęć do nadchodzącej industrializacji doprowadziły go do przeznaczenia pod Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Towarzysze Chwały
programme.desc: Czy dla dwóch oficerów kawalerii może być coś gorszego niż walka z Indianami? Tak. To walczyć o tę samą kobietę.

programme.title: Wielebny Colt
programme.desc: Do Tucson przybywa wielebny Miller z planem budowy kościoła. W dniu jego przyjazdu zostaje obrabowany bank. Mieszkańcy Tucson, podejrzliwi wobec nowego wielebnego, bo ten nosi przy sobie broń, natychmiast obwiniają go o napad.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Bezbożnicy
programme.desc: Banita i łowca nagród poszukują meksykańskiego bandyty Corbancho, który grasuje w okolicach El Paso, obrabował bank w Tuscon i uciekł z 400 000 dolarów.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 28,29,30
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Zabójstwo za Sto Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Johnny Forest stara się spełnić prośbę umierającej matki - ma sprowadzić swojego wyjętego spod prawa brata Clinta żywego do domu.

programme.title: Kasztanek
programme.desc: Chłopiec z rancza dostaje kucyka. Chłopiec go kocha, ale ten ucieka. Zaczyna się niespodziewana i tragiczna w skutkach historia.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Trumna Pełna Dolarów
programme.desc: Na granicy z Meksykiem trwa frontierska waśń. Bracia banity Hagena zostali zabici przez rodzinę Nevada's Kida.

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Żadnych Grobów na Cmentarzu
programme.desc: Jerry, Reno i Paco trafiają do więzienia, gdzie spotykają młodego Meksykanina, który twierdzi, że został skazany za przestępstwo, którego nie popełnił.

programme.title: Zimny Zabójca
programme.desc: José Desman zabija swojego pracodawcę, pana Salazara, byłego sędziego, który skazał jego ojca na śmierć.

programme.title: Zabójczy Dzieciak
programme.desc: Bezwzględny i okrutny kapitan Ramirez poluje na rewolucjonistów w poszukiwaniu Świętego - prawego przywódcy meksykańskiej rewolucji przeciwko Federales.

programme.title: Compañeros!
programme.desc: Szwedzki handlarz bronią i meksykański chłop łączą siły, by uratować intelektualnego przywódcę rewolucji. W trakcie misji przytrafiają im się różne przygody.

programme.title: Wojna Uczuć
programme.desc: W 1946 roku grupa niemieckich jeńców omyłkowo trafia do radzieckiego kobiecego obozu przejściowego i pod dowództwem okrutnego komendanta obozu Pawłowa musi zmierzyć się z wrogością radzieckich więźniarek i strażniczek.

programme.title: Klony Kroniki Stwórcy
programme.desc: Klony Kroniki Stwórcy. Grupa nastolatków znajduje tajne laboratorium i walczy klonami, które są nastolatów lepszą wersją.

programme.title: Załamania
programme.desc: Amy i Scott, pozbawieni pieniędzy i talentu, opracowują desperacki plan popełnienia morderstwa doskonałego. Przechodząc między kolorowymi fantazjami i pełnymi nadziei urojeniami, dzieciaki odkrywają, że ich intryga ma na celu popełnienie morderstwa najgroźniejszego.

programme.title: Milenialsi
programme.desc: Rozdzierająca serce historia dwóch młodych par, które przechodzą z okresu dojrzewania do dorosłości i stają w obliczu związanych z nią wyzwań i problemów.

programme.title: Młody Disney
programme.desc: Film oparty na książce „Walt przed Mikim”. Przedstawia wczesne lata kariery Walta Disneya.

programme.title: Tajemniczy miliarder
programme.desc: Komedia romantyczna w wersji z polskim lektorem - Tajemniczy miliarder. Przezabawne perypetie przystojnego biznesmena, który pod przykrywką "bezdomnego miliardera" udaje się do Nowego Jorku.

programme.title: Starzy Znajomi
programme.desc: Mężczyzna z nadwagą spotyka na szkolnej bieżni dawną koleżankę z klasy. Gdy oboje stają się sobie bliscy i inspirują się nawzajem, ich przeszłość wkrada się z powrotem do ich życia i zaczyna zagrażać wszystkiemu, co wypracowali.

programme.title: Tajemnica Kansas City
programme.desc: Były skazaniec próbuje uczciwego życia, ale zostaje wrobiony w kradzież miliona dolarów. By oczyścić swoje imię, rusza do Meksyku, gdzie wpada na trop bandytów i skorumpowanego policjanta. Wciągający noir z dynamiczną akcją i tajemnicą do rozwiązania.

programme.title: Bez Nakazu
programme.desc: Młody detektyw łączy siły z doświadczonym policjantem pod przykrywką, by rozwiązać sprawę brutalnego morderstwa popełnionego przez gangsterów.

programme.title: Śmierć na receptę
programme.desc: Film kryminalny w wersji z polskim lektorem -- Śmierć na receptę. Przedstawiciel farmaceutyczny odwiedza małe miasteczko w Luizjanie w interesach. Znajduje się w mrocznym świecie korupcji i morderstw. Ma 24 godziny życia. Ucieka przed policją, mafią i szeryfem, który chce go zabić.

programme.title: Przetrwaj albo zgiń
programme.desc: Młoda dziewczyna ucieka przed wojną domową. Przez pomyłkę ląduje w odległej, niezamieszkanej części Australii. Teraz musi dotrzeć jakoś do cywilizacji. Będzie walczyć z głodem, naturą i... Myśliwym chcącym zemścić się na dziewczynie za śmierć syna.

programme.title: Bliźniacze Miasta
programme.desc: Kiedy programista komputerowy odkrywa, że jest śmiertelnie chory, musi ścigać się z czasem, aby uratować swoje małżeństwo i naprawić zmarnowane życie.

programme.title: Źli Ludzie
programme.desc: Dziwna i inteligentna czarna komedia, pełna s*xu, przemocy, brudnej polityki i sławy, BAD PEOPLE to przezabawna opowieść, która przypomina nam, że każdy z nas ma swoją ciemną stronę!

programme.title: Ścigając Roberta Barkera
programme.desc: Fotograf- paparazzi zostaje wplątany w sfabrykowaną historię tabloidu, która ma na celu doprowadzenie do upadku znanego aktora.

programme.title: Darowany koń
programme.desc: Po stracie matki Amanda pracuje na ranczu biznesmena. Gdy jego córka odrzuca nowego konia, dziewczyna postanawia go trenować. Odkrywając talent Misty, odzyskuje nadzieję i radość.

programme.title: Odzyskując Przyjaźń
programme.desc: Dlaczego bezwzględnego biznesmena miałaby nagle interesować przyjaźń? Być może po to, by odzyskać coś, o czym nigdy nie wiedział, że to stracił?

programme.title: Tarzan i Zielona Bogini
programme.desc: Lord Greystoke, czyli Tarzan, opowiada o przygodach w Gwatemali, gdzie pomagał majorowi Martlingowi i Uli Vale w poszukiwaniu Zielonej Bogini. Totem, w którym ukryta była formuła materiału wybuchowego, jest celem bandytów i prymitywnych plemion. Tarzan musi stawić czoła niebezpieczeństwom, by ocalić totem.

programme.title: Hibiskus
programme.desc: Młody pracownik cmentarza musi w tajemnicy przez 3 dni opiekować się dziewczyną.

programme.title: Omen
programme.desc: Mirę nawiedzają coraz to straszniejsze koszmary. Jej ojciec postanawia wyjechać z córką i swoją ciężarną żoną z dala od miasta na ustronne ranczo w Teksasie. Liczy, że tam rodzina odpocznie.

programme.title: Gdybyś Tylko Wiedział
programme.desc: Jest to historia Louise, projektantki mody, u której w młodym wieku rozwija się Alzheimer, prawdopodobnie dlatego, że za młodu była maltretowana przez swojego chłopaka.

programme.title: Szybcy i Szaleni
programme.desc: Jako dziecko w latach osiemdziesiątych w RPA, Lukas marzy o tym, by zostać mistrzem wyścigów na ćwierć mili. Jego mama mówi mu, żeby trzymał się z dala od tych ludzi, ponieważ są rasistami. Lukas jest zbyt młody, by wiedzieć, co to jest rasista i słyszy to jako "rasista". Film śledzi jego podróż jako młodego człowieka we współczesnej RPA, gdzie ograniczenia wynikające z koloru skóry nie mają już zastosowania... od zera do bohatera w 10 sekund! Z pomocą dwóch szalonych bio-chemików, Lukas będzie ścigał tytuł króla ćwierć mili w Brakpan!

programme.title: Walka
programme.desc: Młody weteran piechoty morskiej wraca z wojny i staje przed nowym wyzwaniem. Musi zmierzyć się z biedą, bólem fizycznym i psychicznymi ranami, które wyniósł z frontu. Codzienność okazuje się trudniejsza niż pole bitwy.

programme.title: Suma Istnień
programme.desc: Liz jest ofiarą brutalnej napaści, ale zostaje zahipnotyzowana, aby zapomnieć, że to się kiedykolwiek wydarzyło. Jednak napastnik posunie się do wszystkiego, aby upewnić się, że nigdy o nim nie zapomni.

programme.title: W Pułapce Strachu
programme.desc: Darlene i jej córka Victoria szukają schronienia w odległym wiejskim domu dla maltretowanych kobiet, prowadzonym przez surową i twardą, ale sympatyczną i pomocną Bea. Sprawy przybierają zły obrót, gdy Bea okazuje się być kompletną wariatką, która ma szczególnie niebezpieczny wpływ na podatną na wpływy Victorię.

programme.title: Wojny o Niepodległość: Powstanie
programme.desc: Po ciemnej stronie Księżyca otwiera się tunel czasoprzestrzenny, którym do naszej części galaktyki przybywa bezwzględny gatunek obcych. Planeta Ziemia jest na ten atak nieprzygotowana.

programme.title: Zemsta Lizzie Borden
programme.desc: Około 120 lat po tym, jak najsłynniejsza amerykańska morderczyni Lizzie Borden zabiła tam swoich rodziców, grupa studentek wprowadziła się do kwatery w starej posiadłości w Nowej Anglii, aby urządzić piżama party.

programme.title: Żyjąc ze Zmarłym
programme.desc: Max McLean przeżywa przygody w lesie z młodym mężczyzną o imieniu Ish, który pomaga jej odnaleźć sens w samobójstwie jej chłopaka.

programme.title: Anioły w Piasku
programme.desc: Czy Esperanza będzie w stanie pokazać Tomowi prawdę o jego przeszłości, teraźniejszości i przyszłości? Czy uda jej się uratować wszystkich młodych ludzi na świecie, którzy cierpią na depresję w okresie Bożego Narodzenia? Czy uda jej się przekonać Toma, by w pełni wykorzystał swoje życie, póki ma na to czas?

programme.title: Poznaj Hope
programme.desc: Historie miłosne dziadka pouczają mężczyznę i dziewczynę o realiach miłości.

programme.title: Ostateczna sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Kiedy członek rodziny jednego z nich zostaje zaatakowany, zespół byłych elitarnych żołnierzy zostaje wezwany do akcji. Rozpoczyna się bezwzględna gra, której zasady są proste: zabijaj i nie daj się zabić.

programme.title: O Kościach i Ludziach
programme.desc: Życie szóstki zaprzyjaźnionych graczy RPG zostaje wywrócone do góry nogami, gdy jeden z nich zaciąga się do wojska i jedzie do Iraku. Geek movie bez samouwielbienia.

programme.title: Kaskaderka
programme.desc: Adan & Samuel, bracia bliźniacy, którzy marzą o sukcesie jako kaskaderzy filmowi, po przyjęciu niejasnego zlecenia zostają wplątani w porachunki mafii. Teraz czeka ich walka o życie. I tym razem jest ona prawdziwa.

programme.title: Oracabessa
programme.desc: Podczas odkupieńczej podróży w celu odnalezienia zaginionego 6-letniego chłopca, pewna studentka krzyżuje ścieżki z bezwzględnymi handlarzami ludźmi.

programme.title: Pokaż Się
programme.desc: Przyszedł, żeby pogodzić się ze stratą. Coś nie chce mu na to pozwolić.

programme.title: Rozstępy
programme.desc: Po śmierci ojca, Lyle Bennett wyrusza w ekstremalną podróż utraty wagi w nadziei osiągnięcia zdrowia i szczęścia. Jego cel będzie pchać go poza jego fizyczne granice i przetestować siłę jego psychicznej i emocjonalnej stabilności.

programme.title: Moje Światełko
programme.desc: Owen jest fotografem cierpiącym na nieuleczalną i wyniszczającą chorobę oczu, która wkrótce doprowadzi go do ślepoty. Zanim całkowicie straci wzrok, wraz z żoną Laurą wyrusza w jedyną w swoim rodzaju podróż do Parku Narodowego Yellowstone. W HD.

programme.title: Mistrz Ucieczek
programme.desc: Sfrustrowany tym, jak działa społeczeństwo i polityka młody człowiek z trudną przeszłością daje upust swoim emocjom na portalu społecznościowym. Nieświadomie daje początek rewolucyjnemu ruchowi społecznemu.

programme.title: Bliżej Boga: Podróż Jessiki
programme.desc: Wiara matki zostaje wystawiona na próbę, gdy jej córka umiera na raka, a jej wyobcowany ojciec powraca.

programme.title: Obiekt 36
programme.desc: Samotniczka Gwen ma obsesję na punkcie prześladowania i badania obcych ludzi, zawsze na odległość. Kiedy jeden z jej obiektów w nieoczekiwany sposób wkracza w jej życie, może to ją zmienić w sposób, którego nigdy by nie przewidziała.

programme.title: Drugi Raz
programme.desc: Do małego miasteczka Brattleboro w stanie Vermont przybywa tajemnicza dziewczyna, by stworzyć dla siebie nowe życie. Jej przeszłość pozostaje nieznana.

programme.title: Tandem Hearts
programme.desc: Przeprowadzka do Portland w Oregonie i znalezienie pracy w gastronomii jest łatwe dla Paula i Ramony. Zmagający się z problemami muzyk, pozbawiony kolegów z zespołu, Paul staje się introwertyczny i nastrojowy.

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Come on Cowboys
programme.desc: The Mesquiteers are back! This time they're helping out a friend who has been framed for counterfeiting. And one of their pledges is to look after his young daughter. Robert Livingstone, Ray Corrigan, and Max Terhune star in this Republic Pictures feature, bringing all the usual laughs and action you know from the other Mesquiteer films!

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Rawhide Rangers
programme.desc: Blackie's gang is creating havoc and the Ranger, Brand Calhoun and his brother go to investigate.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agent's claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Men's investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Stories of the Century

programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as railroad detective Matt Clark who needs to track down a group of cattle rustlers along with their notorious leader Billy the Kid (played by Richard Jaeckel).This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Bean discovers that a young vagabond he jailed for a minor offense may be involved in a major unsolved gold heist.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, a con involving the Haunted Hills draws Judge Roy's attention. Letty is among those who undergo hypnosis to recall long past events.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are assigned to escort an accused criminal to his hanging.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The Mingo False Faces are accused of a series of thefts sweeping the valley.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Gunnar, a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family, arrives in Ponderosa, where the family takes him in for the night. Unknown to the Cartwrights, however, is Gunnars leading of The Comancheros, a dangerous band of criminals. After Little Joe and his girlfriend are kidnapped by The Comancheros, the Cartwrights and Gunnar must work things out.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Shine on Harvest Moon
programme.desc: Jackson and his gang are cattle rustlers holed up in Jackson Hole Wyoming. Roy's partner Brower was once Jackson's partner and is now suspected of being in cahoots with him. Someone is tipping off Jackson as to the cattle's whereabouts and when Roy learns who it is he has a plan to trap Jackson and clear his partner. Starring Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, and Myrtle Wiseman as 'Lulu Belle. Directed by Joseph Kane.

programme.title: Down Texas Way
programme.desc: The sixth film in Monogram's Rough Rider series once again follows Buck Roberts (Buck Jones), Tom McCoy (Tim McCall), and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) as undercover US Marshals posing as outlaws in order to confound their enemies. When Sandy is framed for murder by a gang of frontier racketeers who hope to take over a small town as their headquarters, Buck and Tom must work separately to save their buddy from a lynch mob and foil the crook's dastardly schemes.

programme.title: In Old Cheyenne
programme.desc: Roy Rogers plays a newspaper reporter sent to Cheyenne to investigate a reputed troublemaker. While on the scene, he discovers who the real bad guys are, and sets out to right some wrongs. Also starring Roy's usual sidekick George 'Gabby' Hayes, plus Joan Woodbury, and George Rosener. This Republic Pictures western was helmed by director Joseph Kane (The Undersea Kingdom, Dakota) and features two musical numbers: 'Bonita' and 'Linda Flor'.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her father's honor after he's killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: Northwest Trail
programme.desc: Mountie Matt OBrien assignment is simple: He is to escort the rather grouchy, and slightly annoying, Miss Katherine Owens to a remote outpost. Things complicate however when they arrive at the outpost and he stumbles upon an illegal mining operation. Stars include Bob Steele, Joan Woodbury, and Poodles Hanneford.

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of America's westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Between Men
programme.desc: When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir George's missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Dave O'Brien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to San Pablo, Mexico, to find out what's behind the trouble an American tungsten mine is having. When they arrive, they discover the mine has been closed, the wells are all poisoned and the town is in the grip of a malaria epidemic. To make matters worse, the lawmen have been followed by four gunslingers determined to give the American troubleshooters all the trouble they can handle - and more. Russell Hayden stars.
